participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is nurturing and passionate, always seeking to connect with others through her love for dance.
participant_1.background: I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park. I work in a publishing building. I felt like I was going to have a heart attack when my coworker yelled at me in front of the whole office. I've studied ballet all my life. I love my mother because she's always been there for me.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Max is creative and driven, with a strong sense of purpose in helping others while expressing himself through music and culinary arts.
participant_2.background: I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love. I would find another way to express my creativity. I am a student living at home while pursuing my music industry degree. I am a chef. I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.

content.text: Hey there! What are your hobbies?
I'm currently in school for music and I love to cook.
Wow, that's awesome! I've studied ballet all my life but I've always wanted to learn how to cook!
That's cool! What's your favorite thing about ballet?
I love the sense of community and the feeling of accomplishment when I nail a new move.
I totally get that. I love the feeling of creating something delicious and seeing people enjoy it.
That's so great! I wish I could cook like you!
Haha, it takes a lot of practice! But I'm sure you could do it if you put your mind to it.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
No problem! What's your favorite food?
Me too! What's your favorite Italian dish?
That's so good! I love the cheese on top.
